metadata.title: CVE-2015-9099 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The lame_init_params function in lame.c in libmp3lame.a in LAME 3.99.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid read and application crash) via a crafted audio file with a negative sample rate. It was discovered that LAME incorrectly handled certain audio files. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: lame package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.99.5+repack1-9build1').
